attributes.action: update and improve the quality of service given to the sufferers of endometriosis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To put endometriosis as part of sex education as it affects both sexes respectively.
For GPs and Consultants to receive better education at medical training due to lack of knowledge,support and understanding.
To provide support for those who suffer depression from finding it difficult to cope with this disease.
To arrange local groups so that the  sufferers can meet up.
To update the D.W.P. that endometriosis is a debilitating disease, therefor there are many women out there that geniunely need D.L.A because their health is impaired so badly that they are unable to work.
To make it clear to companies that the employee who has endometriosis should not be penalised on their employment (+ records) for the following reasons:
Off sick time for having diagnosis surgery.
Off sick time for treatment surgery.
Time off due to the disease causing the employee to be unable to work at intervals.
For endometriosis sufferers to be given as many IVF treatments as required without restrictive limits in case of failure to concieve.
To provide public poster boards regarding information about endometriosis.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
